name: Grubstitute
description:
Grubstitute

Friss so viel Fischfutter wie möglich um nicht zu verhungern. Doch lass dich nicht von den anderen Fischen wegstoßen!

Devour as much fish food as possible, else you will starve. Don't let the other fish knock you away from your delicious next meal!

This game is an entry for MiniBeansJam #3

Theme
Piranha & Placeholder

Team - Kanumann Productions

  • Sarah Köhler (@nepiheimer) - UI und Texturen
  • Alessandro Famà (@alexzen_) - Musik und Sounds
  • Sebastian Kraus (@HatiEth) - 3D Modelle
  • Jona Ostermann - Programmierer
  • Steven Pauls - Programmierer
  • Sven Drewniok (@Whitebock) - Programmierer

Externe Assets

- Skybox
- https://wildpicks.design/product/banaue-handwritten-free-font/

GitHub

https://github.com/Duck-Mc-Muffin/miniBeansJam3

Versions

Version 1.5 was submitted one hour after the deadline. It includes minor bugfixes, higher difficulty and a highscore server.
